title: Hidan no Aria Reloaded – Cast Off Table - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Harem   Romance   School Life   Supernatural
tags: Absent Parents   Battle Academy   Collection of Short Stories   Hidden Abilities   Reluctant Protagonist   Secret Identity   Secrets   Tsundere
author: Akamatsu Chuugaku
description:
A collection of seven stories of set in the world of Hidan no Aria. It was released in the Blu-Ray & DVD limited edition volumes of the anime. 

I – Strip Mahjong, II – Strip Billards, III – Princess Kaguya’s Electric Railway, IV – Dice, V – Roulette, VI – Poker, and VII – The Game of Life

It also contains the short stories The Case of Naruse Yukari and The Case of the Lost Peachbuns.>
